Supporting Docs

Die Cut Sticker Customization
Product Configuration

4 min
overview you can integrate die cut sticker products for your print store just like any other standard product follow the steps below to understand how you can add it to your system product configuration product details to start, navigate to the admin panel > products > print products > add button additional options unlike standard products, die cut sticker products have a unique set of options based on your product offerings, you can create additional options such as finishing types and material effects to enhance the sticker personalization experience studio events to provide a smooth, interactive, and error free die cut sticker customization experience , you must bind all additional options with the appropriate studio events this ensures customers can visualize their selections in real time, order processing is accurate, and the final print output matches their expectations to ease the product setup, you will find a few predefined studio events for the die cut sticker personalization product type events description attributes finishing refers to the final touches applied to print products currently, options include spot uv, which adds a glossy finish to specific areas, and foil finish, which adds a metallic sheen for a premium look spot uv foil color foil pages material type select the type of materials to be used for the die cut product there are different materials available, like matte, gold chrome, rainbow holographic, etc premium transparent matte heavy duty heavy duty matte gold silver wall stickers holographic
Did this page help you?
